ygData.subject: RE: Niv's Melody of Preservation
ygData.msgSnippet: ... damage ... is ... NOTE: the numbers in the data file do not necessarily correspond to the amount of bonus given by the song. The HP Absorbsion Shield (not
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> Subject: RE: RE: Niv's Melody of Preservation
>
> I'd agree if a level 47 person would gain any benefit from a 10 point
damage
> shield. That was my question, how often does a level 47+ person ever get
> hit for 10 points or less? Anyone out there who can answer that? As it
is
> a 10 pt damage shield would stop pretty much only the 1 pt hits I get. I
> seldom get hit for more than 1 and less than 10. Do hit point shields
> prevent damage from fire shields and the like?

NOTE: the numbers in the data file do not necessarily correspond to the
amount of bonus given by the song.

The HP Absorbsion Shield (not damage shield as we called it earlier) will
absorb it's full amount of damage before it gets cancelled. So if the Sand
Giant kicks you
for 30, you would take only 20, and the shield would be down, until your
song pulsed again.

Once the song is actually tested, we can see how effective it is. I think
is is a great idea, I just hope that the song will be useful in it's final
form.

Wayne
